price: 56. Kaadu nummah fiqawna Ni- astootiy ni inkittinaanc tascasse inkih kaa nuybulleeh, usuk tokkel tet dirabboyseeh cakki oggolam cineh.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
